entry.title: Use Gridea and GitHub Pages to Build your Site
entry.summary:
1. Download Gridea from here.
  2. Create a github repo named $(user_name).github.io.
    replace user_name with your github user name. and set its visibility as public.
  3. Generate a personal access token.

ğŸ‘ æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨ Gridea ï¼

entry.content:
1. Download Gridea from here.
  2. Create a github repo named $(user_name).github.io.
    replace user_name with your github user name. and set its visibility as public.
  3. Generate a personal access token.
